channel.title: All connect to my PC IP!
channel.description:
Hello,
I made a server, but all players connect to ONE ip. (my pc IP!)
If i IPBAN any1, we all get ipbanned. If i IPMUTE any1, we all get muted,(even if you create a new account.)
Please help me. ,Thanks.

i didnt ask for that?
All players that joiins, joining on MY PC IP.
